message.content:
cs.CV, cs.RO, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.AI. 

The paper proposes a method for real-time surgical tool tracking in laparoscopic videos using a CNN + Convolutional LSTM neural network trained end-to-end, but weakly supervised on tool binary presence labels only. The approach leverages spatio-temporal coherence and temporal dependencies in the motion of the surgical tools. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories are computer vision (cs.CV) and robotics (cs.RO). Additionally, the paper involves machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) techniques for training the neural network. Finally, the paper deals with multimedia (cs.MM) data in the form of laparoscopic videos.
